description: This file defines Kotlin data classes representing network Data Transfer Objects (DTOs) for various content-related entities, along with extension functions to map these DTOs to domain models with safe default values. It is part of the network layer of an Android application.

classes.name: NetworkIndiceCopy
classes.description: DTO representing index copy data received from the network.

classes.name: NetworkInstructionImages
classes.description: DTO for network instruction images with various preview links.

classes.name: NetworkContentInfo
classes.description: DTO for content information including ID, title, and poster URL.

classes.name: NetworkVodRatingSettings
classes.description: DTO for Vod rating configuration settings.

methods.name: NetworkIndiceCopy.toDomainSafe
methods.description: Converts NetworkIndiceCopy DTO to domain IndiceCopy with default values.

methods.name: NetworkInstructionImages.toDomainSafe
methods.description: Converts NetworkInstructionImages DTO to domain InstructionImages with default URLs.

methods.name: NetworkContentInfo.toDomainSafe
methods.description: Converts NetworkContentInfo DTO to domain ContentInfo with default placeholders.

methods.name: NetworkVodRatingSettings.toDomainSafe
methods.description: Converts NetworkVodRatingSettings DTO to domain VodRatingSettings with default timing values.
